QperpCalculator qperps

Detailed Description

template<std::size_t n>
class QperpCalculator1< n >

Author:
Simon Wicks <simonw@phys.columbia.edu> A wrapper around the QperpCalculator from the old version, version1, to use in the newer GlvRadiative3 template calcaluation The interface necessary for GlvRadiative3 is converted into the relevant calls for the old code. In this way, the old, tested qperpcalculator can be used in the newer code, to compare to results for any newer versions.
